title: Cloud Key Management Service (KMS)
description: Manages keys and performs cryptographic operations in a central cloud service, for direct use by other cloud resources and applications.

cloudkms_projects_locations_keyRings_cry.title: Returns metadata for a given CryptoKeyVersion.
cloudkms_projects_locations_keyRings_cry.description: Returns metadata for a given CryptoKeyVersion.

cloudkms_projects_locations_keyRings_cry.title:
Update a CryptoKeyVersion's metadata.

state may be changed between
ENABLED and
DISABLED using this
method. See DestroyCryptoKeyVersion and RestoreCryptoKeyVersion to
move between other states.
cloudkms_projects_locations_keyRings_cry.description:
Update a CryptoKeyVersion's metadata.

state may be changed between
ENABLED and
DISABLED using this
method. See DestroyCryptoKeyVersion and RestoreCryptoKeyVersion to
move between other states.

cloudkms_projects_locations_list.title: Lists information about the supported locations for this service.
cloudkms_projects_locations_list.description: Lists information about the supported locations for this service.

cloudkms_projects_locations_keyRings_cry.title:
Returns the public key for the given CryptoKeyVersion. The
CryptoKey.purpose must be
ASYMMETRIC_SIGN or
ASYMMETRIC_DECRYPT.
cloudkms_projects_locations_keyRings_cry.description:
Returns the public key for the given CryptoKeyVersion. The
CryptoKey.purpose must be
ASYMMETRIC_SIGN or
ASYMMETRIC_DECRYPT.

cloudkms_projects_locations_keyRings_cry.title:
Decrypts data that was encrypted with a public key retrieved from
GetPublicKey corresponding to a CryptoKeyVersion with
CryptoKey.purpose ASYMMETRIC_DECRYPT.
cloudkms_projects_locations_keyRings_cry.description:
Decrypts data that was encrypted with a public key retrieved from
GetPublicKey corresponding to a CryptoKeyVersion with
CryptoKey.purpose ASYMMETRIC_DECRYPT.

cloudkms_projects_locations_keyRings_cry.title:
Signs data using a CryptoKeyVersion with CryptoKey.purpose
ASYMMETRIC_SIGN, producing a signature that can be verified with the public
key retrieved from GetPublicKey.
cloudkms_projects_locations_keyRings_cry.description:
Signs data using a CryptoKeyVersion with CryptoKey.purpose
ASYMMETRIC_SIGN, producing a signature that can be verified with the public
key retrieved from GetPublicKey.

cloudkms_projects_locations_keyRings_cry.title:
Decrypts data that was protected by Encrypt. The CryptoKey.purpose
must be ENCRYPT_DECRYPT.
cloudkms_projects_locations_keyRings_cry.description:
Decrypts data that was protected by Encrypt. The CryptoKey.purpose
must be ENCRYPT_DECRYPT.

cloudkms_projects_locations_keyRings_cry.title:
Schedule a CryptoKeyVersion for destruction.

Upon calling this method, CryptoKeyVersion.state will be set to
DESTROY_SCHEDULED
and destroy_time will be set to a time 24
hours in the future, at which point the state
will be changed to
DESTROYED, and the key
material will be irrevocably destroyed.

Before the destroy_time is reached,
RestoreCryptoKeyVersion may be called to reverse the process.
cloudkms_projects_locations_keyRings_cry.description:
Schedule a CryptoKeyVersion for destruction.

Upon calling this method, CryptoKeyVersion.state will be set to
DESTROY_SCHEDULED
and destroy_time will be set to a time 24
hours in the future, at which point the state
will be changed to
DESTROYED, and the key
material will be irrevocably destroyed.

Before the destroy_time is reached,
RestoreCryptoKeyVersion may be called to reverse the process.

cloudkms_projects_locations_keyRings_cry.title:
Encrypts data, so that it can only be recovered by a call to Decrypt.
The CryptoKey.purpose must be
ENCRYPT_DECRYPT.
cloudkms_projects_locations_keyRings_cry.description:
Encrypts data, so that it can only be recovered by a call to Decrypt.
The CryptoKey.purpose must be
ENCRYPT_DECRYPT.

cloudkms_projects_locations_keyRings_cry.title:
Restore a CryptoKeyVersion in the
DESTROY_SCHEDULED
state.

Upon restoration of the CryptoKeyVersion, state
will be set to DISABLED,
and destroy_time will be cleared.
cloudkms_projects_locations_keyRings_cry.description:
Restore a CryptoKeyVersion in the
DESTROY_SCHEDULED
state.

Upon restoration of the CryptoKeyVersion, state
will be set to DISABLED,
and destroy_time will be cleared.

cloudkms_projects_locations_keyRings_cry.title:
Update the version of a CryptoKey that will be used in Encrypt.

Returns an error if called on an asymmetric key.
cloudkms_projects_locations_keyRings_cry.description:
Update the version of a CryptoKey that will be used in Encrypt.

Returns an error if called on an asymmetric key.

cloudkms_projects_locations_keyRings_cry.title:
Create a new CryptoKeyVersion in a CryptoKey.

The server will assign the next sequential id. If unset,
state will be set to
ENABLED.
cloudkms_projects_locations_keyRings_cry.description:
Create a new CryptoKeyVersion in a CryptoKey.

The server will assign the next sequential id. If unset,
state will be set to
ENABLED.

cloudkms_projects_locations_keyRings_cry.title:
Create a new CryptoKey within a KeyRing.

CryptoKey.purpose and
CryptoKey.version_template.algorithm
are required.
cloudkms_projects_locations_keyRings_cry.description:
Create a new CryptoKey within a KeyRing.

CryptoKey.purpose and
CryptoKey.version_template.algorithm
are required.

cloudkms_projects_locations_keyRings_cre.title: Create a new KeyRing in a given Project and Location.
cloudkms_projects_locations_keyRings_cre.description: Create a new KeyRing in a given Project and Location.

cloudkms_projects_locations_keyRings_cry.title:
Gets the access control policy for a resource.
Returns an empty policy if the resource exists and does not have a policy
set.
cloudkms_projects_locations_keyRings_cry.description:
Gets the access control policy for a resource.
Returns an empty policy if the resource exists and does not have a policy
set.

cloudkms_projects_locations_keyRings_cry.title:
Sets the access control policy on the specified resource. Replaces any
existing policy.
cloudkms_projects_locations_keyRings_cry.description:
Sets the access control policy on the specified resource. Replaces any
existing policy.

cloudkms_projects_locations_keyRings_cry.title:
Returns permissions that a caller has on the specified resource.
If the resource does not exist, this will return an empty set of
permissions, not a NOT_FOUND error.

Note: This operation is designed to be used for building permission-aware
UIs and command-line tools, not for authorization checking. This operation
may "fail open" without warning.
cloudkms_projects_locations_keyRings_cry.description:
Returns permissions that a caller has on the specified resource.
If the resource does not exist, this will return an empty set of
permissions, not a NOT_FOUND error.

Note: This operation is designed to be used for building permission-aware
UIs and command-line tools, not for authorization checking. This operation
may "fail open" without warning.
